Testfile 1 Fichier de test 1
keep the word 'Hello' in the translated string<--> Hello dear user ! Hello cher utilisateur !
Please keep the word 'Hello' in english in the translated string<--> Hello dear {1} ! Hello cher {1} !
Japanese : まど を 閉じる。 Japonais : まど を 閉じる。
UTF8 icons : 🌎✈🔧🎥🦇🔕🎧✔🎲 Icones UTF8 : 🌎✈🔧🎥🦇🔕🎧✔🎲
printl $tab, i18nh("This linecode ") & i18nh("has three ") & i18nh("parts")<--> This linecode Cette ligne de code
has three a trois
parts parties
printl $tab, i18nh("This linecode ","First part") & i18nh("is splitted in three ","Second part") & i18nh("and has comments too!","Third part")<--> First part<--> This linecode Cette ligne de code
Second part<--> is splitted in three est scindé en trois
Third part<--> and has comments too! et a aussi des commentaires!
